entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Rouyn-Noranda
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 10.1Â°C
